original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND c.UserId = p.OwnerUserId AND p.OwnerUserId = ph.UserId AND ph.UserId = v.UserId AND p.Score<=13 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=2 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=3 AND v.BountyAmount<=50 AND u.DownVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount <= 50
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E5.UserId=E4.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 13 AND (CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 4) AND posts.CommentCount >= 0 AND posts.FavoriteCount <= 2
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E5E4.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 3
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E4E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E5E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E5E4E2.UserId=E3.UserId)
